content: hello friends as promised i have a sweet little cat pattern to share with you today his name is beans and he is a friendly little fellow i have knitted him in the round in the magic loop but you can also knit him on dpns in the round or knit him flat and simply sew him up at the back if you prefer to knit on 2 needles if this is what you would like to do then just knit the pattern in stocking stitch flat with 2 needles materials oddments of variegated dk wool 4mm circular needle or dpns or 4mm straight needles sewing up needle fleece for stuffing
